sourcesContent:
import './CardScroll.css' function CardScroll() { const projects = [ { id: '#UAH-QuietRoom', title: "UAH QuietRoom", dates: "May 2023 - July 2023", url: "https://quietroom.app", details: (
  • Web application that finds UAH classroom availability for students to find study spots on campus
  • Allows searching for schedule data for a specific room
  • Displays room metadata including room number, room type, and capacity
  • Generates schedule-view for selected room for readability
  • Uses React.js with Next.js for front-end and .NET for back-end
) }, { id: '#Unscene', title: "Unscene", dates: "Aug 2022 - Dec 2022", url: "https://github.com/salsajeries/Unscene", details: (
  • Semester team project developing a desktop Java application with Apache Netbeans
  • Movie and TV Show manager that allows creation of watchlists and progress dashboard of media as the user watches
  • Pulls data from TheMovieDB API for all media
) }, { id: '#Adventure-to-the-Sun', title: "Adventure to the Sun", dates: "Oct 2022", url: "https://github.com/salsajeries/spaceapps-2022", details: (
  • 48-hour simulative game that allows the user to play as the Parker Solar Probe on its mission
  • Raw data from the solar probe is used to generate solar particles containing velocity and temperature, which the player must collect for points
  • 3D game developed in Godot game engine
) }, { id: '#Pomodoro-Widget', title: "Pomodoro Widget", dates: "May 2022 - Jun 2022", url: "https://salwajeries.com/pomodoro-notion/", details: (
  • Web application with built-in timer for Pomodoro study technique, task list, and Spotify playlist
  • Responsive feedback for completion of tasks and study time
  • Uses Bootstrap for GUI features
  • Designed to be embedded as a Notion widget
) }, { id: '#SafeStay', title: "SafeStay", dates: "Mar 2022", url: "https://github.com/salsajeries/GigaHurtzFrontEnd", details: (
  • 48-hour web application that connects refugees with host families based on user preferences
  • Compatability algorithm based on a point system generates a compatability score for match rankings
) }, { id: '#Notion-Clock-Widget', title: "Notion Clock Widget", dates: "Jan 2022", url: "https://salwajeries.com/clockwidget-notion", details: (
  • Web application that displays date, time, and greeting message
  • Allows for custom background and text color for personalization
  • Designed to be embedded as a Notion widget
) } ]; return (
{images.map((p) => ( ))}
); } export default CardScroll;
